title: bluefirecorp_
author: bluefirecorp_
content: Someone reported a truthful comment on reddit and I was "warned" for harassment.Pretty much it was a fat lady who was unemployed whining that her bf's mom told her off after they split up.Effectively, she went on to directly whine about it to the ex-bf... which kinda implies she's the clingy type who doesn't understand they were "done".Not only that, she lacked a driver's license and overfed her cat to the point of obesity.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: International Lawyer arrested for speaking the truthhttps://rumble.com/v3q8lbw-reiner-fuellmich-attorney-courageous-freedom-fighter-arrested-flown-to-a-ge.html
